dict.acceptation: 胡说，废话；荒谬的念头；愚蠢的行为；胡闹；

sent.orig: In the beginning was nonsense, and the nonsense was with God, and the nonsense was God.
sent.trans: 太初有胡说，胡说与上帝同在，这胡说就是上帝。

sent.orig: Life consists of one long succession of nonsense, a bit of sense, but mostly nonsense.
sent.trans: 但是它所有的一切能够帮助你进步，给你一些生活的来源，生命就是做许多的无意义的事情。

sent.orig: Nonsense, errant nonsense, as ever was talked!
sent.trans: 废话，彻头彻尾的史无前例的废话！

sent.orig: The learned fool writes his nonsense in better language than the unlearned, but still 'tis nonsense.
sent.trans: 有受教育的傻瓜，写出的胡言乱语，较没受教育的人辞句优美，不过它们还是胡言乱语。

sent.orig: You have been talking nonsense make me talk nonsense.
sent.trans: 你信口胡说，要我也信口胡说。
